state: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! Here is how to play! First, it would be good if you could venture south. Then, venture west. If you can succeed at that, try to go west. Then, make an attempt to go to the south. And then, try to venture south. And then, retrieve the cuboid key from the floor of the cellar. Then, make an attempt to move north. Then, go to the west. Then, unlock the cuboid hatch. And then, make it so that the cuboid hatch in the parlor is opened. Then, make an attempt to head north. Once you accomplish that, make an effort to move north. That done, attempt to venture west. After that, pick up the burger from the floor of the bedroom. That's it! -= Sauna =- Of every sauna you could have shown up in, you had to saunter into a typical one. You make out an opened trunk. The trunk contains a fly larva. There is an unguarded exit to the south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded. > -= Sauna =-0/1
